texto: quality assurance, Subcommittee 2, Quality systems. This fourth edition cancels and replaces the third edition (ISO 9004:2009), which has been technically revised. The main changes compared to the previous edition are as follows: — alignment with the concepts and terminology of ISO 9000:2015 and ISO 9001:2015; — focus on the concept of “quality of an organization”; — focus of the concept of “identity of an organization”.
